sourcesContent:
import { Component, effect, signal } from '@angular/core'; import { Router, RouterLink, RouterLinkActive, RouterOutlet } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', standalone: true, imports: [RouterOutlet, RouterLink, RouterLinkActive], template: `
|
Access Management
Dashboard Applications & Features Groups Roles Users Templates Audit Log
` }) export class AppComponent { constructor(private router: Router) {} }
